title: Experiencing That First Bike Feeling Again at 53: Bobby Julich’s New Dream Machine
content:
Retired pro Julich embraces modern bike technology to the fullest with his new road bike — but can’t help but remember how much simpler prepping for a ride used to be.

Read the full article at Experiencing That First Bike Feeling Again at 53: Bobby Julich’s New Dream Machine on Velo.
author: Will Tracy
